scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run beautify-lint
scripts.beautify-lint: beautify-lint lib/**/*.js hot/**/*.js bin/**/*.js benchmark/*.js test/*.js
scripts.beautify: beautify-rewrite lib/**/*.js hot/**/*.js bin/**/*.js benchmark/*.js test/*.js
scripts.postcover: npm run lint && npm run beautify-lint
scripts.publish-patch: npm run lint && npm run beautify-lint && mocha && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
